bpm.gateway.core
Interface Server

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractFileServer, DataBaseServer, FileSystemServer, FreemetricServer, RepositoryServer
public interface Server

This interface is the main interface to define InputDataStream/OutputDataStream providers

Author:
LCA
